ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Another Nerf (but we can't complain about this one!)
ygData.msgSnippet: My guild went to Everlost last night and took a swim under the ice.  Found a cave and after our pally gave the skelly something we killed this other guy
ygData.messageBody:
My guild went to Everlost last night and took a swim under the ice. Found a
cave and after our pally gave the skelly something we killed this other guy
Miragul (sp?) something to help our pally do some kinda quest. After that,
we went up to the Plane of Sky and started working on getting to I4 - guess
his quest is up there. I forgot to try charm on the Sky Princess but soon
enough had a go at an azarack.

Me and Suladan (48 bard) tried to charm aza's. 100% resist. 100% taunt.
100% dead. Meanwhile, a lev 50 enchanter stuck mez on one so looks like the
bard uber-charm is gone but aza's are now mezz-able. Things were kinda
scattered and we shoulda done better clearing azaracks as we have cleared em
in one pass before but this time we fought until we were all dead. Anyhow,
we were staging in Gfay for CorpseRecovery when the freaking GM event starts
up and soon 180, 190, 200 ppl are in the zone. Then 205, 210 and at
215.....

You have been disconnected.

Login and find songs unmemmed due to restoring to a previous save. Then,
disconnected. Re-log, rinse, repeat. This goes on for way too long and
finally it dawns on us to run to Lfay. We CR and clear the rest of the
aza's. Then its 3 hours longer than I should have stayed and I jumped off.
Read this morning that one of our druids has stuff to complete a quest -
might be a first for our server. What a night - ugh.

Sylly


----- Original Message -----
From: "Daniel P. Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
To: "EQ Bards" <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, April 17, 2000 6:39 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Another Nerf (but we can't complain about this one!)


> Hot off the www.eqvault.com presses: I guess we can't complain as long as
> it's a REASONABLE Cap!
>
>
> Today's patch primarily contained preparations for Kunark, including
some
> new art. There was also a bug that was fixed with a bard song that was put
> in last Tuesday. The song (a charm upgrade) was not capped. Someone was
kind
> enough to send us a screenshot of someone with a *really nice* pet named
> Cazic-Thule.
>
> -Gordon
>
> Slyde Katzenjammer
>
> 39th Level Bard of Xegony
